content: --- title: Weather Data Model description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T11:24:55.458Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:38:09.950Z --- # Weather Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | stationId | `'string'` | Station code | | time | `'datetime'` | Date and time of the observation in UTC | | wind | `'string'` | Direction of the wind | | prevailing | `'string'` | Prevailing visibility | | rvr | `'string'` | Runway visual range | | snow | `'string'` | Snow condition | | cloud | `'string'` | Cloud condition | | temperature | `'string'` | Temperature | | altimeter | `'string'` | Altimeter setting | | recent | `'string'` | Recent weather in the period | | windshear | `'string'` | Supplementary information on windshear | | remarks | `'string'` | Remarks | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information |
fm:title: Weather Data Model description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T11:24:55.458Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:38:09.950Z
